message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  I could meet you halfway at $9,000, which is a steal for the value you'll receive.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to stay within my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $8,750.
